message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering its true value. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value might be higher, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you taking the time to consider the product. While $12000 is below my minimum price, I'm willing to be flexible.  I'm prepared to accept $16500. This takes into account the value of the product and offers a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can make this work!

I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, Alice. However, based on my research and understanding of the market value, I believe $14500 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
